defmodule Blockytalky.UserCode do
  use Blockytalky.DSL
repeatedly do
   set(:light , get_sensor_value(:A1)
  )
  set(:temp , gp_get_temp(:D2)
  )
  serial_wrap("lightvalue",get(:light))
  serial_wrap("tempvalue",get(:temp))

end

end
